summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lucky Wheel dragon theme redesign. Successfully verified red-gold dragon ornate theme implementation across all frontend components. All functionality working perfectly with new luxurious Chinese/Lunar New Year + Fantasy dragon aesthetic.
passed_tests: Frontend main page loads with dragon theme (dark red background #1a0a0a, gold text)
Wheel displays perfectly with red-gold color scheme and ornate styling
Spin form works: username/redeem code inputs and spin button functional
Full spin flow: admin code generation → user spin → confetti win modal with dragon theme
Admin dashboard 'Dragon's Lair' with all three tabs (Codes, Prizes, Stats) working
Mobile responsive layout (390x844) works perfectly with dragon theme
Dragon ornate styling: gold borders, shadows, Cinzel/Crimson Pro fonts
Win modal displays with dragon theme and 'CLAIM VICTORY' styling
All interactive elements maintain dragon aesthetic
Navigation between pages preserves theme consistency
success_percentage: Frontend: 100% (All dragon theme elements and functionality working perfectly)
